title: Yorkipom
description:
Pups ready to leave

1blond female
1black and tan male

Outstanding Yorkie-Pom Puppies - Rare Blond Carrier Lineage

We are delighted to offer an exceptional litter of Yorkshire Terrier x Pomeranian (Yorkie-Pom) puppies, bred with an emphasis on health, temperament, and confidence.

These puppies carry the desired Blond/Golden Yorkie genetics, resulting in beautiful, unique colouring and soft, teddy-bear coats.

About the Parents:

Mum: Our beloved, gentle **** family pet (Yorkshire Terrier).

Dad: A wonderful, gentle Pomeranian.

Both parents are here to meet and exhibit superb temperaments. They are actively involved in raising the puppies, ensuring exceptional early socialisation.

Commitment to Health & Confidence

We raise our puppies with a gold-standard care protocol:

Veterinary Care: Full vet checks, administered slowly and gently due to their toy size.

Advanced Vaccination Schedule: Protected with a three-shot primary course at 6, 8, and 10 weeks.

Early Socialisation: Raised in a busy home environment with supervised co-parenting by Mum and Dad to build maximum confidence before they transition to their new homes.

Deworming/Flea Protocol: Completed at 2, 4, 6, and 8 weeks, with both parents treated simultaneously.

Comprehensive Puppy Pack (a Month of Supplies!)

Your puppy will come with an unparalleled supply kit, ensuring a stress-free start:

Microchipped & Registered

Full Health and Vaccination Records

Month of their current food

Harness, Lead,
Brush and Dental Sticks
Toys, Chews, treats and a Scent Blanket

Ready to move to their new homes after their 8-week vaccination if agreed, on 7th January

Serious enquiries only. Please tell us a bit about the loving home you can offer.
These puppies are being raised with an emphasis on lifelong commitment. .

We welcome serious families to visit the puppies and meet both parents.

Reserve: A non-refundable Â£200 holding fee is required to reserve your chosen puppy.

title: F1 COCKAPOOS FROM LICENCED BREEDER
description:
We have a lovely litter of F1 cockapoos. WE ARE LOCAL AUTHORITY LICENCED AND COCKAPOO CLUB GB ACCREDITED BREEDERS so you can buy with full confidence that these puppies have had the best start in life and we are fully legal. There are 5 boys and 1 girl available, the boys are chocolate, black and rear black/tan, the girls are chocolate and rear black/tan colours. These wonderful little dogs will make a great family pets. They have a loving playful nature that makes them willing and easy to train as family pets or assistance or working dogs as they have many field trial champions in the family tree. They are well socialised and handles by both adults and children. With all parents being DNA health tested this means that your puppy has been born clear of all these nasty diseases which is the best start in life that we can give them.

Mum Luna is a KC reg black/tan cocker spaniel. She has a loving, gentle temperament. She is here for you to meet as well as her sister. She is 3rd generation of our cocker spaniels. she is BVA eye tested clear, DNA tested clear Acral Mutilation Syndrome, Degenerative Myelopathy, Exercise-Induced Collapse, Familial Nephropathy, Glycogen Storage Disease VII, PFK Deficiency, Progressive Retinal Atrophy, Progressive Rod-Cone Degeneration and is Luxating patella tested 0/0.

Dad charlie Brown is a KC reg chocolate miniature poodle he is loving and playful. He is DNA Von Williebrand Disease 1 (vWD1), Progressive Retinal Atrophy (PRA-prcd), Progressive Retinal Atrophy (PRA-crd4/cord1), Degenerative Myelopathy(DM), Neonatal Encephalopathy, Hereditary Cataracts. Gangliodosis, Osteochondrodysplacia, FN. He is also Luxating patella 0/0.

The puppies are micro chipped, vet checked, 1st vaccination, 4 weeks insurance, wormed every 2 weeks and flea treated. They also come with a puppy pack to include family tree, sales contract, information sheet, food, bowl, blanket, a toy and lots of other things. THEY WILL BE READY TO GO TO THEIR NEW HOMES FROM THE

Mum Cups (Copa de Guadamia) is another total softy, she has an incredible affinity with the children (we have 6) These dogs however do need a strong leader that will set firm boundaries as a puppy, that will shape and set them up for a stable adulthood. title: 5* health tested Australian Labradoodles
description:
Just 3 girls available

Iâ€™m a 5 star council approved registered breeder, I have been ethically breeding doodles for over 16 years, all dogs are part of the family are never given away when they have finished Breeding, I put their welfare and happiness above breeding, I make my own high quality raw food which all the puppies are brought up on. I have 6 generations of amazingly intelligent, loyal and loving Labradoodles, Please read our advert in full as we have contained a lot of information and questions you may have, if you do have any questions to ask that I haven't answered please feel free to contact me. Our beautiful Jasmine has just had her second litter. These eagerly awaited puppies will bring pleasure to any household, Jasmine is my home produced Austrailian Labradoodle and Charlie is proving to be a fantastic stud dog They will be ready to go to their new homes 28th November. A lot of time, preparation and effort goes into planning our litters we do everything correctly, including obtaining a breeding license from our council , and we are registered with the HMRC. We are completely accountable for our puppies and have strict guidelines to follow, we are inspected by our council and independent vets, and have beed awarded a 5 star licence for our breeding program, dogs and their care. Please be careful of adverts that aren't listed as "licensed breeder" as it is now a legal requirement to be licensed which people try to avoid doing, due to the time and money this costs to do. Even if you are having a "one off litter" this requires a licence . People listed as "breeder/individual" haven't been inspected to see what conditions their puppies or dogs are kept in. I have copies of my breeding license to show anybody whom is wanting to purchase one of our beautiful babies. I am pleased to announce my litter of multi generation pure / full Australian labradoodles, many people claim their dogs are Australian but they are mixes and not the real thing. pure Australi

title: ğŸ‘‘ Superb Rare Health Tested Cockadoodledoo Puppies
description:
Cockadoodledoo Puppies ready from 12th November. From DNA health tested parents. These puppyâ€™s will come toilet trained & fully crate trained. First vaccinations L4. Luxury puppy pack. Pics and testimonials from previous litter available.

We are absolutely delighted to announce that on Wednesday 17th September, our beautiful GoldenDoodle, Noodle has safely given birth to her second stunning litter of 7 Cockadoodledoo Puppies ğŸ¶ 1 girl ğŸ©· and 6 boys ğŸ’™ ğŸ¶

The puppies ğŸ¶ are absolutely gorgeous and we couldnâ€™t be more proud.

Mum and all 7 babies are doing well, feeding and gaining weight.

Puppies -

So here we have a very rare, well bred, lovingly home-raised, one-of-a-kind litter of Goldendoodle X Cockapoo puppies, affectionately known as the Cockadoodledoo. Itâ€™s a delightful fusion of these two beloved Doodle breeds.

By combining the friendly and intelligent traits of the Goldendoodle and Cockapoo, this breed is highly trainable and sociable. Both parents are renowned for their hypoallergenic coats, resulting in these Cockadoodledooâ€™s typically having low-shedding, soft fleecy, wavy to curly fur.

With moderate to high energy levels, these Cockadoodledoo puppies will thrive on regular exercise and mental stimulation. They are friendly, affectionate, and full of playful energy, making them an ideal family pet. Cockadoodledoos exhibit a gentle temperament, getting along famously with children, dogs and other pets.

Their sociability is a remarkable trait, allowing them to quickly form deep bonds with their owners. Unlike some breeds, they are not known for excessive barking. They are renowned for being eager to please and easy to train. With their easy trainability and gentle nature, a Goldendoodle X Cockapoo mix adds a touch of beauty and companionship to any family home.

These Cockadoodledoos will be raised in a loving home environment, socialised with adults, children, dogs, cats, handled daily and groomed. They will get lots of attention from me and my children e

What is an f1bb cavapoo
An F1BB Cavapoo is a specific generation of this popular Poodle-Cavalier mix, created by breeding an F1B Cavapoo (a mix with ~75% Poodle) back to a purebred Poodle, resulting in a dog that's approximately **** Poodle and **** Cavalier King Charles Spaniel, making them typically very low-shedding, highly hypoallergenic with curly coats, and leaning towards Poodle-like energy, ideal for allergy sufferers but demanding more grooming.

1 girl ğŸ’“ - This little girl has a small umbilical hernia (a minor belly button hernia). It is small in size, soft, and is not causing her any discomfort or affecting her development in any way. An umbilical hernia occurs when the muscle wall around the navel does not fully close after birth, leaving a small opening. If treatment is required, it is a routine procedure and can be repaired at the same time as spaying. For this reason, her price has been reduced accordingly to reflect the cost of the surgery. title: Asian Toy Poodle (Korean & Chineese)
description:
*Please read the entire description before enquiring about the puppy*

This playful Asian Toy Poodle is looking for a loving home and is ready to leave now.
Dad is Korean and mum is Chineese, which makes this puppy a VERY rare Asian Toy Poodle with all the perfect characteristics - short nozzle and legs, floppy ears, even red hypoallergenic coat and overall small size currently weighting only **** at 5 months old ! He has been health checked and has all of her vaccinations up to date and is ready for an owner that admires such a prestigious breed!

Toy Poodles are intelligent, affectionate, and eager to please, making them easy to train and deeply loyal to their families. They are playful and energetic without needing excessive exercise, and their adaptable nature makes them well-suited for various living environments, including apartments. However, they crave human interaction and may develop separation anxiety if left alone too long. Regular grooming, mental stimulation, consistent positive training, and early socialization are essential for keeping them healthy, happy, and well-adjusted. ğŸ©

Why choose this puppy ?
If you are committing to buying such a prestigious breed puppy, I am sure you looked all over the internet before seeing this beautiful boy. At 5 months old you see exactly what you are getting and there are no growth or characteristic surprises which you might get from a puppy that is only couple of months old and hasn't developed as much. As I'm sure you did your research and it is quite easy to tell that this puppy is a magazine cover quality Asian Toy Poodle which just shouts Luxury ! âœ¨ï¸

There is no other such quality deep red colour coat Asian Toy poodle available in UK at the moment !

Feel free to contact and ask questions and arrange a video call or a physical viewing to see the pup ğŸ“²ğŸ¾

title: Superb KC Lab Puppies for Family Pets
description:
*One girl puppy still available*

Here is Judeâ€™s litter of KC registered puppies, specifically bred to be happy, healthy dogs well suited to all the adventures of being a valued family pet. Their KC registered parents are extensively health-checked and selected for their excellent temperaments; and the puppies have been carefully raised and socialised to give them the best possible start in life. Due to Christmas, we've taken these puppies further along their socialisation programme, carefully preparing them to join their new owners after the festivities.

We have one or two litters a year, we work from home, and Emma is a dog behaviourist. So we have put a great deal of care, attention and behavioural expertise in to preparing the puppies for their future life as family pets.

The puppies have been raised on our smallholding, and so are familiar with both home and outdoor environments. They have been taught to sit quietly on your knee, and understand that all four paws should be on the ground when they interact with humans. They have a reliable recall, and are learning to toilet in designated areas. They are confident, curious, and playful, and their individual personalities are starting to emerge.

We have taken great care to avoid any distress or over-excitement as we carefully socialise them to the life they can expect as family pets. Plus Emma will provide you with life-long behaviour and welfare support should you need it.

Their mum, Jude, is home-bred from our first litter. She is a fantastic dog: loving, trusting, super-intelligent, keen to get everything right, and always up for chasing a ball! She has passed the health tests required by the Kennel Club, and 19 of the 20 breed-specific DNA tests under the Embark scheme (plus a further 240 covering all DNA test for all dog breeds). Judeâ€™s KC credentials can be found on the KC website under her Kennel Name Floshbeck Jude.

Dad, Duddon, is from Ryan Ennis-Holdenâ€™s Mariank Show Dogs. Ryan is an internationally

title: Miniature Dachshunds
description:
We have a stunning litter of miniature dachshund puppies. They are, silver dapple and Black and Tan in colour.

Mum to this litter is Mia; She is our full pedigree Miniature Dachshund. She is a beautiful chocolate and tan colour and has fantastic health. Dachshunds are a fantastic breed and low maintenance with regards to health and grooming needs. Which makes them the perfect pet for families. Known for their loyal nature, they make great companions and suit an owner that can share their need for love and affection. Mia has the most loving nature and has been the best mum to her babies.
The father to these puppies is also a full miniature dachshund.

Puppies are ready to leave us now. We have girls and one boy available! They are gorgeous! They are well socialised and spoilt by my children :-)

Puppies will leave us from 8 weeks of age.

Puppies leave with the following:

Full vet check by our vet - copy of report given to new owners.
Micro-chipped.
First vaccination.
Puppies will have been wormed every 2 weeks and last date of worming will be documented.
Preventative flea treatment.
Puppy information pack containing advice on diet, vaccinations, socialisation, exercise, training, worming, grooming. (We give this pack to new owners at the 5 weeks visit so you have time to read it through prior to collecting the puppy).
A contract of sale.
A scent blanket.
Toys.
A weeks' supply of food.
Bath, blow-dry and nails clipped.
We are always at hand to offer support and advice.

We will be holding viewings for new owners who have reserved a puppy when the puppies reach 6 weeks of age.

A Â£200 non-refundable deposit will be required to reserve a puppy.

Please email for further information.

title: Beautiful Maltese Puppies all reserved
description:
All reserved ****


Only 1 boy left Beautiful Maltese Puppies Our gorgeous girl has had her babies 2 girls and 3 boys, All thriving, healthy, and keen to suckle. Puppies are full breed Maltese , although they will not be KC Registered, only forever family homes need apply. Maltese are highly affectionate, loving little dogs , and absolutely amazing with children and make great companions. Maltese puppies are hypoallergenic and don't shed, Ideal if anyone has allergies and can't have animals that shed hair, Maltese have an average life expectancy of 12-15 years, any potential owners need to be willing to commit and care for them for that amount of time. All owners need to be willing to let me visit to see where they will be going and ensure to an extent that they will be cared for and have appropriate veterinary care if it was ever needed. Puppies will be brought up in my family home with a large breed dog and young children, will be well socialised and loved throughout their short time with us. Only a couple of puppies will be available as we bred purely to add to our family from our own heathy, great tempered girl, and also so our large dog was aware right front he start that there would be puppies staying with us forever. Maltese require daily grooming to prevent matts forming, a groomer every 6-8 weeks will be required when they are older to keep your puppy in top condition and prevent any matts causing discomfort, I can recommend an amazing groomer which mum visits often for her groom. My puppies will be so loved here and I only expect the best for them , please PLEASE ONLY APPLY if you can offer the best loving home for these little beauties. Puppies will be health checked at vet , Microchipped Have Injections Wormed from 2 weeks old Puppies will come with a puppy pack and I will provide you with information on the Maltese breed and offer any advice or support if you ever need it. I would also ask that new owners keep in contact through social media and keep us

Pups are expected 3/12/25 and will be ready to leave at 8 weeks old around the end of January.

Azura was bred and raised by BMN Corsos, her parents are BMN Bronson (UK bred from imported parents) and BMN Storm (imported from blue bloodline cane corso in Romania) both fully health tested and ICCF registered Corsos. They were selectively chosen to breed and azura was picked out of the litter to stay with BMN Corsos, sheâ€™s been trained to a high standard from day one and is a credit to the breed.
She has been raised with children and dogs, sheâ€™s great with children and shows real loyalty to her family. Confident and happy in busy public settings and chilled out around the house, a perfect corso.

Kane is a huge corso imported from Serbia and has been raised and trained by elite corsos alongside their children, corsos and daschounds. He is fully health tested and his temperament is perfect, a real family corso he is your typical big loving boy. His parents are Hermes del nostro and Jamaica del nostro from Del Nostro Destino kennel. He is a bulletproof dog, confident and unphased in any environment, good with children and loves attention.

Both dogs are from fully health tested kennels and long lines of champions but most importantly healthy, good looking corsos with perfect temperaments.

With well documented instagrams for both kennels you can scroll through and see the raising of both parents along with looking back through the growth of pups from previous litters @bmn_corso @elite_corsos_

title: LeonBerger Cross
description:
We have beautiful Leonberger cross German Shepherd puppies looking for loving, permanent homes. These puppies are expected to grow into loyal, intelligent, and protective companions with gentle, family-oriented temperaments.
We are looking for responsible owners who have the time, space, and commitment to accommodate a large-breed dog. Both Leonbergers and German Shepherds are known for their intelligence, loyalty, and strong bonds with their families, and these puppies will thrive in homes where they are included as part of everyday life.
Only genuine, caring homes will be considered where the puppies will receive proper training, socialisation, exercise, and plenty of love.
If you can offer a suitable home and a lifelong commitment, please get in touch for more information.

Price negotiable and open to offers for anyone who can offer a very loving home.

Pups will be very well socialised, growing up in family home with children and other dogs, they have been specially bred for their parents temperament and drive. title: Champion Bloodlines KC Labrador Retriever Puppies
description: Our girl Polly has welcomed her first and only litter of exceptional Labrador Retriever puppies who are KC registered from champion bloodlines and fully health tested. The parents are from specially selected champion blood lines, from heavily titled championship lines combined with amazing health test results for several generations, ensuring we have produced the healthiest pups possible. Also to make sure these pups will grow to be strong and healthy we did a COI test on the parents to make sure there would be no inbreeding within the lines. COI stands for Coefficient of Inbreeding. The lower the score between the parents the healthier the pups. These tests can only be done on KC registered dogs. Polly (Dam) and Bear (Sire) scored an outstanding **** with the breed average being **** and **** being an indicator of genetic equivalence and as you can see there would be no chance with their low score. Since the puppies come from working stock, they cannot be compared to the show strain of Labrador Retriever that tend to be less agile, while having broader heads and deeper chests. The working strain of labrador tend to be extremely easy to train, whilst making loyal, biddable pets. The mother Polly (Lady Luna Selene) is an exceptional example of the breed. She has many FTCH in her lines including FT CH Tanyrhallt Blue Bloods and FT CH Drakesheads. She has the very famous FTCH Greenbriar Viper of Drakeshead in her pedigree lines. The Drakeshead kennel name is known for breeding very successful and healthy working type Labradorâ€™s. Please note, her sire is on the champ dogs website and was fully health tested with amazing results and hip/elbow scores. She has a trainable nature and an excellent temperament which she will pass on to her pups. Not only does she have the capability to be a good working dog as she is so easily trainable she is our family pet and my 1 year old sonâ€™s bestest friend. She is so gentle and kind natured with him and I couldnâ€™t ask for a better dog

At Luxe Poms UK, we are passionate about producing some of the most beautiful, healthy, and well-socialised Pomeranians available in the UK. We are a small, dedicated, home-based kennel, committed to quality over quantity. Every one of our puppies is raised under our roof, with love, attention, and expert care â€“ not in kennels or by third-party breeders.

We are proud to say that we own and care for all of our breeding dogs ourselves â€“ including our two stunning bitches and our own exceptional stud. This means we have complete control over every stage of the breeding process, from carefully planned matings to the nurturing of our litters. Because no outside stud dogs are used, we can confidently stand behind the genetic integrity, health, and temperament of every puppy we produce.

We have two litters, 3 from one of our Pure White bitches and 2 from our other Pure White bitch.

We own the stud.

Our Pomeranians are fully Kennel Club registered, with all the paperwork and documentation to prove their lineage. What truly sets us apart is that these puppies are currently the only Pomeranians advertised on the Kennel Club website that meet the very high standard of â€œSire meets the Kennel Club Best Practice Health Standards.â€ This designation is a mark of quality and responsibility, and it assures our buyers that our breeding practices meet or exceed the strictest welfare and health requirements.

Health and Wellbeing First

Every breeding is meticulously planned with health, structure, and temperament as the top priorities. Our dogs undergo the relevant health testing recommended by the Kennel Club and breed clubs, ensuring we are doing everything possible to produce puppies free from hereditary issues. title: Kc registered fox red Labrador Puppies
description:
We are incredibly proud of this litter, born 7th August 2025. The puppies have been carefully raised in our busy family home, surrounded by children, dogs, and everyday life, which means they are confident, outgoing, and well socialised. They are handled daily, introduced to different sights and sounds, and given the very best start, setting them up perfectly for their future roles.

At present we have two boys available, both strong, healthy, and showing fantastic temperaments. They are bold and inquisitive, yet affectionate and people-focused, with the classic trainable nature you would expect from these bloodlines. With their breeding, they will excel in working homes or active family environments, combining ability, temperament, and style.

The dam, Huntonsdoch In For A Penny (â€œBonnyâ€), is a stylish, intelligent working bitch with a sweet nature, used regularly in the shooting field and equally happy as a family companion. She has an excellent temperament â€” biddable, kind, and hardworking. Bonny has a hip score of 5:4, elbow score of 0:0, unaffected eyes, and is DNA clear for CNM, EIC, HNPK, prcd-PRA, SD2.

The sire, FTCh Jarailstar Hogen of Stauntonvale (â€œBraeâ€), is one of the most accomplished Labradors in the country. He became a Field Trial Champion at just two years old, has qualified three times for the International Gundog League Championship (2023), and is a member of the England Gundog Team. In 2025, he won both the CLA Challenge Trophy for highest scoring retriever and the Wilson Challenge Trophy for highest scoring dog overall at the CLA Game Fair International Team Gundog Competition. Brae has a hip score of 4:2, elbows 0:0, unaffected eyes, and is fully DNA clear for CNM, EIC, HNPK, MCD, prcd-PRA, SD2, STGD.

title: standard bullies
description:
5dogs 5bitches now 3 dogs 2 bitches left for sale- nothing happened with the other female i am just keeping her, being the first born and the runt she has has a little extra tlc due to being born 2 hours earlier and mum was in shock and staying away from her. i had to get her out of the sac and encourage mum to help and get her to be latched on for feed after this she accepted her and was fab with all the births that follwed. 2 born in 1 sac and since learnt my bitches mother was born in the same sac as her sister. she did not have the same phenomenon with her pups so must be something that is genetic but skipped a generation. my 2 birn together are boys, brown and have white lines down there face, are 2 biggest and look like clones almost of the father.

( please read my profile for more information on parents and environment) i have also had to put english bulldog as the options are not there for Standard bully breed which is what mine are and both parents are standards also. mums parents are XL (bitch) and pocket (dog) bullys so she is a standard and pups are 100% standards.
there mother is 2 years old and this is and will be her only litter. she is a very attentive mother and great temperament in general, very intelligent and already showing to have passed this trait on to the pups as already a little fast on the milestones with one wagging his tail and one walking more than a step or two. these will be wonderful additions for any family especially if they are like there parents (dad also has great intelligence ) these pups will be having a great start in life and i hope to find people who will have the the same dedication as my family to continue their journey. they will be microchipped and vet checked and first vaccinations before leaving us. i will not be likely to let them go before 12 weeks however if my bitch gets fed up slightly before then the plan may change, however as i have stated i plan for 12 weeks before they are rehomed.

title: Siberian Huskies- BIG and WOOLY (4 Female, 1 Male)
description:
All five Siberian Husky puppies are confident, curious, and very family-friendly. They have been raised in a home environment and are already comfortable around people, enjoying human company just as much as interacting with other dogs. They are affectionate, playful, and alert, showing the typical friendly and social Husky temperament.

Each puppy has been given a call sign inspired by their individual physical characteristics and personality associations: Ridgeline, Bullseye, Lone Wolf, Chowhound, and Cobra. These names help distinguish their unique traits while they grow and develop.

Some of the photos in this listing show the puppies at a younger age than they are now. At present, all puppies have fully upright, alert ears, and they have almost completely transitioned to puppy food, with nursing occurring only very occasionally for comfort.

For clarity, the photos in this listing are organised as follows:

Photos 1â€“9: Ridgeline

Photos 10â€“18: Bullseye

Photos 19â€“27: Chowhound

Photos 28â€“36: Cobra

Photos 46+: Additional photos of the mum and dad, as well as the puppies when they were younger

The puppies will turn 8 weeks old on 18 January 2026. During that week, they will receive their basic first vaccinations and their respective microchips, in line with responsible rehoming practices. They will be ready to join their new families shortly after.

*****PLEASE NOTE: Lone Wolf has already been sold and is no longer available.*****

*****ALSO NOTE: Ridgeline has also been reserved and is no longer available (as a deposit has been put down for her).*****

*****ALSO NOTE: Chowhound has also been reserved and is no longer available (as a deposit has been put down for her).*****

We are delighted to offer our healthy, playful Siberian Husky puppies, raised in a loving family home.

title: ** Tri/parti Pomeranian pups must be sold for xmas**
description:
Descended originally from sled dogs much smaller in size today â€“ Pomeranians are smart, playful and full of energy. Known for their foxy faces, â€˜smileyâ€™ features and luscious coats â€“ not to mention that distinctive mane-like â€˜ruffâ€™ â€“ their bushy tail completes the picture they also make great watch dogs.

The tri-colour pattern in Poms is the presence of "tan points" (markings that appear above each eye like eyebrows, on the muzzle, chest, legs, feet, and under the tail) combined opplwith a white "parti" (partially colored) base coat.
Due to the various ratios and shades possible with these colors, each tri-coloured Pomeranian puppy has a unique appearance like no other.
There is so much to love about the Pomeranian personality. Intelligent and attentive, they are always up for interaction with their owners, so are a lot of fun to have around. They have a maximum height of just 12 inches, the Pomeranian doesnâ€™t need tons of exercise and will adapt well to most home set-ups.

title: F1b Working Dobermann Puppies. Reduced in price for last couple!!!!
description: F1b Dobermann We are proud to announce the birth of 10 F1b Working Dobermann puppies from proven/titled bloodlines and are now taking reservations for a spot on this breeding. These puppies will only be sold to Working/Active pet homes. F1b means we are back crossing to a dobermann so these puppies will be 75% Dobermann 25% Bandogge Instagram ULTIMATE_PINCHERS All of these puppies will come with lifetime support from me. All the puppies from the litter will be getting daily exposure to different stimuli and environments, getting them ready for the real world, exposing them to loud noises, children, people, dogs, cats, car journeys, walking on leads, house training and they will also be going to a couple of puppy therapy days, where they will get lots of interaction from different people and children. If you would like to see pictures/videos of Keres and my other personal dogs my Instagram page. There is also a section in my highlights called pups where you can see how I raised my last litter and all I did with them, being a breeder is not my job I have a love for dobermanns and dogs in general so I am doing this breeding so that I can keep one for my programme. I prefer to not be a full time breeder as I feel by having just the odd litter here and there then I am able to put 100% of my time,effort and love into them. The dam is my own personal dog called Keres. She is not only my pet but she is also worked in protection, high level obedience and competes in multiple trials around the UK. She has placed top 3 multiple times against some of the best working dogs in the uk. She is 50% Dobermann & 50% Bandogge. She is a very easy dog to own, eager to learn, social towards people and good with dogs and other animals if introduced correctly, very calm and easy in the house with a very nice off switch. Dont let that fool you because with one word you can switch the dog into drive and when it comes to training she is a very driven and energetic dog so you will only get to e

description:
very very loved little fluff balls, raised in a loving family home, mum is a lovely calm little show cocker who loves her pups do much she has been the most wonderful mother to them. Dad is a very handsome golden working cocker, both parents are here with us.
All pups have been raised with alot of affection and are very chilled out for such young ones. They love warmth cuddles, playtime and would make the perfeict family pet, however they are spaniels which means they will adore you, and cannot be left too long, ideally suited to people who have time for them, work from home or are retired, as you cant leave them all day. If you ever change your mind please bring the dog back to us so that we can ensure a safe new home. we are also able to help with pet sitting if you go on holiday etc. We love our dogs to bits and wont be selling them to just anyone. They really are magical little pups and will bring you so much joy. We are open to sensible offers for the right homes.

All have curly hair, great proportions and very sweet teddy bear like faces. We are family breeders and these pups are treated like family from the first day of their lives. They have been loved and adored by all of us. There has been lots care, knowledge and experience put into bringing them up. We made sure they are safe, comfortable and healthy. We gave them lots of attention and affection. The puppies are very friendly, calm and love people, especially children. They are also confident, bright and learn very quickly. They are toilet trained, eat solid food and sleep through the night. We made sure they are used to all sorts of noises and are well socialised. They grew up in the house with children, other dogs and cats. They are used to car drives, meeting new people and are friendly towards our two cats. The Pups were part of some puppy therapy and puppy yoga sessions which was great fun for them, as well as an opportunity to socialise with new people. This is our 5th litter and we are proud to say we are in touch with most of our puppies and they all grew into amazing Cockerpoos. All our dogs are very healthy, happy, friendly and have strong bond with their families. MUM Summer - the puppiesâ€™ mother is our family dog bread by us. She is a very special toy Cockerpoo. Incredibly loving, loyal and very intelligent. Her recall is amazing! We are very proud of her. She is a small Cockerpoo, just under 7kg with curly cream hair and big eyes. You can also meet Summerâ€™s mum (the Pupsâ€™ grandma) our very loved show-type Cocker-Spaniel Betty. DAD Hershey is Asian Toy Poodle, Imported from China. He is health tested. He has thick, curly mahogany coat and carries a non fading gene. He is a very calm dog and

title: Adorable jack russell pups wenlock bloodline ready to go to forever homes
description:
Born on the 9th August we now have 3 puppies left from an original litter of 5. Ready to go to loving forever homes. The parents are both family dogs. Mum is our own dog who can be seen with pups. Dad carries the Wenlock bloodline and is the son of Louis Much Wenlock. They are amazing puppies with lovely temperament raised in a family home. Definitely should be viewed.

The Wenlock line refers to a specific lineage of Jack Russell Terriers. These dogs noted for their energetic and playful nature. The Wenlock line is characterized by its smooth, broken, or rough coat. A variety of colours often with white patches including black, tan, or lemon. They are known for their affectionate and friendly manner and usually make excellent companions for families.
